name: Bean There Barista
description:
In a world...

where people are lonely,

and anxiety corrupts even the strongest of hearts,

simple tasks like ordering a coffee become impossible feats of willpower.

Yet, if you want the holy grail of caffeine,

you must try to overcome your fear...

HOW TO PLAY;

Hit the keys of the first letters of each word so Cepheus can place his order and sip a coffee in peace.

What could go wrong.

This game was developed for a university game-jam.
